mapper.insert: insert into user_summary (user, statements, table_scans, file_ios, current_connections, total_connections, unique_hosts, statement_latency, statement_avg_latency, file_io_latency, current_memory, total_memory_allocated) values (#{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statements,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{table_scans,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{file_ios,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{current_connections,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{total_connections,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unique_hosts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statement_latency,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{statement_avg_latency,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{file_io_latency,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{current_memory,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{total_memory_allocated,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select user, statements, table_scans, file_ios, current_connections, total_connections, unique_hosts, statement_latency, statement_avg_latency, file_io_latency, current_memory, total_memory_allocated from user_summary
